predicate.note: Frames file for 'outsell' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. Comparison with other 'out...' verbs (outrun, outpace, etc).

example.name: die Microsoft, die!
example.text: He estimated that 1-2-3 outsold Microsoft's Excel spreadsheet by four-to-one in the quarter, and held a 70% or better share of the spreadsheet market.
